RelatedSentence: Freedom is the first and only access control system that allows entry devices ( ID cards , RFID readers , biometrics , etc. ) to be connected to , and controlled by , standard building IT networks without requiring expensive control panels and wiring .
Freedom brings cyber security protection to access control , eliminates the significant costs of traditional access control systems and providing a green , environmentally friendly solution .
